pr_title: Support of method getHashedData (hierarchical and with groups)

timeline.bodyText: I am just curious. Do we need these two set methods?
timeline.author: balcirakpeter

replies.bodyText: I think this is just to be sure it can be created as an object from two parameters.
replies.author: stavamichal

timeline.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.bodyText: One more small thing. When you chose not to quote hash keys, it would be better to be consistent with all of them.
timeline.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.message:
Support of method getHashedData (hierarchical and with groups)

 - add support to Common.pm
 - add support of new methods to ServicesAgent.pm
 - create a new object HashedGenData.pm as result of reading data from
 RPC (this objects will be used when working with HashedData in
 services)

 - add support of new methods to ServicesAgent.pm
 - create a new object HashedGenData.pm as result of reading data from
 RPC (this objects will be used when working with HashedData in
 services)
